item.title: Samagra Shiksha Employees in Jogulamba Gadwal Stage Innovative Protest, Demand Regularization
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: The indefinite strike by Samagra Shiksha employees demanding regularization of their services reached its 20th day on December 29, 2024. In Jogulamba Gadwal district, the employees staged an innovative protest by wearing chains on their hands and special hats inscribed with slogans like "Break the Chains, Regularize Samagra Shiksha Employees."
Key participants included Jamuna, School Assistant from Boys High School, Gadwal; MD Yunus Pasha, Mohammed Basha, Shankar Naik, and Lakshman from...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
